response.overview: Pitambar is a story of a fearless and tactful warrior who has fought many hardships. Being a rejected child at an early age, he got the chance to be intimate with the roller coaster of life, making him like a rock. He wants to destroy the empire of perpetrators in Parasi to regain his mom's prestigious image but discovers the shocking truths one after the other in his way. The circumstances are against him but his mother is always there to embrace, to lead, and to support him.
response.title: Pitambar
